record.id: field.name="graph" and file.name="format" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: graph
record.file.name: format

brief.brief: In the conversion fields, specify RAD application names that cause data to be converted from entered to internal (stored) form or from internal (stored) to displayed form, such as numeric data displayed as a money amount.

detail.detail: In the input field, specify the name of a RAD application that converts data entered on the format to an internal form or validates the data on entry.
In the output field, specify the name of a RAD application that converts data displayed on the form from an internal form to the desired output form.
For example, numeric data to an amount of money with floating currency symbol, etc.
The label field should contain the 'mask' or picture (if any) that the application requires to re-format the data. For example, (xxx) xxx-xxxx might be the output mask for telephone numbers.
